name: Bluesky Local
tag_list: restaurant-marketing, increase-restaurant-sales, advertising, small-business-marketing, web-marketing, coupons, promotions
description: Unique Way to Increase Restaurant Sales
overview:
BlueskyLocal.com (BSL) provides restaurants an alternative to cutting staff and accepting slow day sales factors (such as weather, seasons, & time) that play a significant role in sales fluctuations.

Problem: Ongoing research demonstrates that the a vast majority of restaurants cite weather (68%), seasons (73%), & events (61%) as the cause for sales drops of 20% or more.

Solution: BSL’s solution to this problem is the world’s first Slow Sales Response (SSR) solution which tracks the external factors that hurt sales (weather, time, etc.) and responds to detected slow sales conditions with coupon promotions delivered via email, text message, and twitter.com.
